name: Guacamelee! Bundle Fantástico
description:
Guacamelee! is modern Metroid-vania style action-platformer-brawler set in a magical Mexican inspired world. Featuring beautiful graphics, non-stop fighting action and multi-dimensional platforming.

The Fantástico Bundle Includes:
- * PlayStation®3 system and PlayStation®Vita system versions of the game *
- Costume Pack DLC
- El Diablo’s Domain DLC
- Official Game Soundtrack (remastered)
- All 3 themes
- 10 favorite avatars
- Chickens, lots of chickens.

1 - 2 Players
Network Features
HDTV screen resolution: 720p, 1080i, 1080p
